text: @realDonaldTrump Elderly that vote for republicans, you and your love ones are dying for COVID19 the most, especially in nursing homes. What do you think will happen once the economy is reopened? VOTE BLUE AND THE SENATE TOO! https://t.co/P7OYR2kZ3e
